PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: A Nova Tributao do Consumo no Brasil: o Imposto sobre Bens e Servios (IBS) e a Contribuio Sobre Bens e Servios (CBS)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O presente projeto de pesquisa visa estudar a nova tributao sobre o consumo no Brasil, inaugurada pela Emenda Constitucional n 132 de 20/12/2023, que alterou integralmente a tributao sobre bens e servios ao determinar que as referidas materialidades sero incidncia de apenas dois tributos, o Imposto sobre Bens e Servios (IBS), de competncia compartilhada dos Estados e Municpios, e a Contribuio sobre Bens e Servios (CBS), de competncia da Unio Federal.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: This research project aims to study the new taxation on consumption in Brazil, inaugurated by Constitutional Amendment n 132 of 12/20/2023, which completely changed the taxation on goods and services by determining that the aforementioned materialities will be the incidence of only two taxes , the Tax on Goods and Services (IBS), which is the responsibility of the States and Municipalities, and the Contribution on Goods and Services (CBS), which is the responsibility of the Federal Union.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The New Consumption Taxation in Brazil: the Tax on Goods and Services (IBS) and the Contribution on Goods and Services (CBS)

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-COMPLETO: Eric Moraes de Castro e Silva

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: O Impacto da Reforma Tributria nos Contratos de Concesso
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: As mudanas no sistema tributrio brasileiro, em tramitao atualmente no Senado, tm potencial de desfazer avanos j chancelados pelo prprio Congresso Nacional. o caso do novo Marco Legal do Saneamento, sancionado na Lei 14.026, em 2020. A ideia discutir, com a participao de empresas do setor, representantes de rgos regulatrios e de controle de contas, alm de especialistas em direito tributrio e administrativo, os impactos que a Reforma Tributria vai promover no setor de saneamento.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The changes in the Brazilian tax system, currently in progress in the Senate, have the potential to undo advances already approved by the National Congress itself. This is the case of the new Legal Framework for Sanitation, sanctioned in Law 14,026, in 2020. The idea is to discuss, with the participation of companies in the sector, representatives of regulatory and account control bodies, as well as specialists in tax and administrative law, the impacts that the Tax Reform will promote in the sanitation sector.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The Impact of Tax Reform on Concession Contracts

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-COMPLETO: Eric Moraes de Castro e Silva
